title: Fishy001
author: Fishy001
created_time: October 01, 2022, 07:52:29 PMLast edit: October 02, 2022, 09:17:00 AM by Fishy001
content: Edit: Bitstars is officialy a scam here full thread about what happened: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415669.0

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: 1. Make a proper scam accusation -  use this format - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260073.02. I don't know why you did realize before that the casino is scam, look at their profile ratings - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3072653. They already have so many scam accusations in this forum aloneQuote from: Jating on March 09, 2020, 01:52:20 AMBut wait, there's more,BITSTARZ IS A SCAM - DO NOT DEPOSIT A DIME $40,000 Stolen!Bitstarz Casino - Confusing review's - What's the final outcome?Bitstarz stole 4 bitcoins from meBITSTARZ IS A SCAM - DO NOT DEPOSIT A DIME - FAKE LICENSE CASINOBitStarz.com SCAM! 2800$ stolen on Bitcoin CasinoSCAM BITSTARZ $350 DOLLARSDon’t deposit on Bitstarz - scamBitStarz.live Scam Casino.I'm sorry for your loss here, that's a huge money whatever angle you look at, so I guess this is an expensive lessons to learn. Just play to reputable online gambling sites, I'm sure you will find a lot in this community.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Your chances to get all your money are slim, they have a lot of complaints here and your story is going to be part of this set of accusations, the least that you can do now is to create the right format for your complaint, complete the full detail with all your evidence, this will become one of the references if ever there are people who are going to research information about Bitstarz, at least you can help people to stop playing here and they will thank you for sharing your story.
